location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Scrapbook of newspaper cuttings about Afghanistan

physicalDescription.extent: The cuttings have been arranged in the scrapbook in chronological order and the pages of the book have been tied into three bundles ff 1-46, ff 47-96 and ff 97-142
Foliation: This file has been foliated in the top right hand front corner of the recto of each folio with a pencil number enclosed in a circle.

mods.abstract: Press cuttings from British and Indian Newspapers regarding the Afghan War (today known as the 2nd Afghan-Anglo War), negotiations in Cabul [Kabul], the British Government's policy with regards to the Indian Frontier, and the movements of the Russians during the war.The cuttings have been taken from a number of newspapers including the Pall Mall Budget, The Pall Mall Gazette, The Globe, The Times, The Pioneer Mail, The Standard, The Daily News, The Daily Telegraph, The Evening Standard, The Saturday Review, The Spectator, The Morning Postand The World.
